item.title: OnePlus 希望以 700 美元的新平板电脑压倒苹果和三星
item.description:

item.description:

item.title: 美国人避免搬家，房屋改建债券销售激增
item.description: 华尔街正在启动债券机器，因为美国的房主们发现，自 2022 年抵押贷款利率开始攀升以来，购买新房已变得遥不可及，他们转而申请房屋净值贷款，并对现有房产进行翻新。【原文：Wall Street is cranking up the bond machine as US homeowners — finding that buying a new house is out of reach since mortgage rates started climbing in 2022 – are instead getting home equity loans and sprucing up their current properties.】

item.title: 特朗普的预算提案对统计机构经费大打折扣
item.description: 我是纽约的美国经济编辑莫莉-史密斯。今天我们关注统计机构的预算削减。请将反馈意见和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册接收本新闻通讯，可以在这里注册。【原文：I’m Molly Smith, a US economy editor in New York. item.title: Vista 首席执行官称人工智能将迫使 60% 的超级返乡人群寻找工作
item.description: Vista Equity Partners 首席执行官罗伯特-史密斯（Robert F. Smith）表示，他预计人工智能将对私人市场行业的就业产生地震般的影响。【原文：Vista Equity Partners’ Chief Executive Officer Robert F. Smith said he expects AI to have a seismic impact on jobs in the private market industry.】

item.title: 图斯克联盟在波兰大选失败后收拢队伍
item.description: 波兰执政联盟试图翻过因其候选人在总统选举中落败而引发的危机这一页，誓言在议会任期过半时重振亲欧盟联盟。【原文：Poland’s ruling coalition sought to turn the page on the crisis sparked by the defeat of its candidate in presidential elections, vowing to rejuvenate the pro-European Union alliance halfway through the parliamentary term.】

item.title: 元的 "爱国主义 "推动了向军事技术的转变
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，我们的每日时事通讯提供彭博社全球记者对科技商业的报道和分析。今天，库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）将报道 Meta 首席技术官安德鲁-博斯沃思（Andrew Bosworth）在彭博技术峰会上关于公司决定从事国防科技工作的评论。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. item.title: 贸易战扩大，德国钢铁之城承受额外痛苦
item.description: 20 世纪 80 年代末，卡斯滕-沃格特（Karsten Vogt）没有听从父亲的劝告，违背家族传统。他还是进入了德国的钢铁行业，接手了曾祖父在两次大战之间创办的企业。【原文：Karsten Vogt didn’t listen to his dad telling him in the late 1980s to flout family tradition. He went into Germany’s steel industry all the same to take over the business his great-grandfather founded between the wars.】

item.title: 芝加哥糟糕的财政状况使其在城市竞争中处于不利地位
item.description:
美国第三大城市的经济增长障碍从未如此之多和棘手。【原文：

The obstacles to economic growth in the third-largest US city have rarely looked so numerous and intractable. 

】

item.title: 英国央行调查显示：英国企业对关税的担忧正在缓解
item.description: 一项受到密切关注的调查显示，大多数英国企业并不担心美国的关税，这种情绪上的巨大变化表明，唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战带来的最初冲击已经逐渐消退。【原文：A majority of UK businesses are not worried about US tariffs, a closely watched survey showed, a dramatic change in sentiment indicating that the initial shock from Donald Trump’s trade war is already fading.】

item.title: 乌克兰维持利率不变，因战争和天气影响预测
item.description: 乌克兰央行连续第二次会议保持其关键利率稳定，因为预计通胀将有所缓解，而与战争相关的风险将拖累经济。【原文：Ukraine’s central bank left its key interest rate steady for the second straight meeting as inflation is expected to ease while war-related risks weigh down the economy.】

item.title: 英国 Centrica 公司签署 200 亿英镑挪威天然气供应协议
item.description: 英国将通过一项协议确保进口挪威天然气，为其经济提供燃料，该协议将加深英国与北欧国家在未来十年的供应关系。【原文：The UK is set to secure imports of Norwegian gas to fuel its economy with a deal that will deepen supply ties with the Nordic nation for the next decade.】

item.title: CVC称欧洲可能面临 "挑战"，收购对手纷纷涌入
item.description: CVC Capital Partners Plc 首席执行官罗布-卢卡斯（Rob Lucas）表示，在欧洲投资可能会面临挑战，因为竞争对手的私募股权公司越来越多地向该地区寻求增长。【原文：CVC Capital Partners Plc Chief Executive Officer Rob Lucas said that investing in Europe can be challenging, as rival private equity firms increasingly look to the region for growth.】

item.title: 盎格鲁集团开始出售戴比尔斯，前首席执行官对其感兴趣
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）即将开始正式出售戴比尔斯公司（De Beers）的程序，此前已收到潜在买家的意向书，其中包括这家标志性钻石矿商的两位前首席执行官。【原文：Anglo American Plc is about to begin a formal sales process for De Beers, after receiving indications of interest from potential buyers that include two former chief executives of the iconic diamond miner.】

item.title: 非洲金融公司称，非洲可从投资者那里获得 1.1 万亿美元的增长资金
item.description: 非洲金融公司（Africa Finance Corporation）周四表示，非洲机构投资者坐拥 1.1 万亿美元的资金，可以满足该地区的长期基础设施需求，并为工业增长提供动力。【原文：African institutional investors are sitting on $1.1 trillion in capital that could finance the region’s long-term infrastructure needs and power industrial growth, the Africa Finance Corporation said Thursday.】

item.title: Palantir 与前金融科技达人 Bolt 合作开发人工智能结账系统
item.description: 由亿万富翁彼得-蒂尔（Peter Thiel）联合创办的数据分析公司Palantir Technologies Inc.正与一键结账平台Bolt Financial Inc.合作，提供人工智能增强型支付流程。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc., the data analytics firm co-founded by billionaire Peter Thiel, is partnering with one-click checkout platform Bolt Financial Inc. to offer a payments process enhanced by artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 诽谤 "间谍指控后，伊朗与国际原子能机构的冲突升级
item.description: 在维也纳举行的一次重要会议召开前几天，一份在外交官中传阅的法律简报称，伊朗正在升级与联合国核监察机构的斗争，指责其核查人员诽谤并提供草率的证据。【原文：Iran is escalating its fight with the United Nations nuclear watchdog by accusing its inspectors of slander and presenting sloppy evidence, according to a legal brief circulated among diplomats days before a key meeting in Vienna.】

item.title: 投资者对就业和前景持谨慎态度，国债反弹势头减弱
item.description: 美国国债涨势趋稳，投资者在周五的就业报告公布前保持谨慎，并略微降低了对美联储降息的押注。【原文：A rally in US Treasuries steadied, with investors cautious ahead of Friday’s jobs report and slightly paring bets on interest-rate cuts from the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 波士顿写字楼市场低迷带来的税收压力增至 17 亿美元
item.description: 波士顿的办公楼将在五年内损失近一半的价值，使波士顿的累计税收损失高达 17 亿美元。【原文：Boston’s office buildings stand to lose nearly half their value over five years, costing the city as much as $1.7 billion in cumulative tax revenue.】

item.title: 税收法案禁止人工智能新规则的提议面临两党反击
item.description: 共和党人试图阻止各州在未来十年内执行新的人工智能规则，但遭到了两党越来越多的反对，暴露了华盛顿在允许更多不受约束的人工智能发展问题上的紧张关系。这项提案被埋藏在众议院上个月通过的全面税收法案的第 278 页和第 279 页中，引起了共和党众议员马乔里-泰勒-格林（Marjorie Taylor Greene）和参议员玛莎-布莱克本（Marsha Blackburn）以及民主党参议员埃德-马基（Ed Markey）和伊丽莎白-沃伦（Elizabeth Warren）的尖锐批评。M【原文：A Republican attempt to block states from enforcing new artificial intelligence rules over the next decade has drawn growing bipartisan objections, exposing tension in Washington over allowing for more unchecked AI development.The proposal, buried on pages 278 and 279 in the sweeping tax bill passed by the House last month, has drawn sharp criticism from Republican Representative Marjorie Taylor Greene and Senator Marsha Blackburn, as well as Democratic Senators Ed Markey and Elizabeth Warren. M】

item.title: 日本麦当劳因 "我的世界 "和 "千与千寻 "热潮而销量大增
item.description: 麦当劳控股有限公司（McDonald's Holdings Co.日本 5 月份的销售额激增，这主要得益于与《我的世界》（Minecraft）电影和《千与千寻》（Chiikawa）卡通形象相关的开心乐园餐（Happy Meal）玩具。【原文：McDonald’s Holdings Co. item.title: 糟糕透顶饱受打击的小盘股迎来买入窗口
item.description: 规模最小的美股已进入一年中历史上最有利的时期，这让人们对这一陷入困境的群体在 2025 年惨淡开局后能够反弹抱有更大希望。【原文：The smallest US stocks have entered a historically favorable time of year, boosting hopes that the beleaguered group can rebound after a dismal start to 2025.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚因担心旅游业而停止在潜水热点附近开采镍矿
item.description: 印度尼西亚将暂停该国东部潜水热点附近一座镍矿的生产，因为担心这会影响旅游业。【原文：Indonesia will suspend production at a nickel mine near a diving hotspot in the east of the country over concerns it could impact tourism.】

item.title: 土耳其在不断扩大的贪污调查中解雇反对派市长
item.description: 土耳其当局解除了五名地方反对党市长的职务，并对他们的党魁展开调查，司法镇压范围不断扩大。【原文：Turkish authorities removed five local opposition mayors from office and launched an investigation into their party leader in a widening judicial crackdown.】

item.title: 英格兰银行格林称人工智能有助于预测通货膨胀
